name: REWIND PLEASE "canvas" edition
description:
REWIND PLEASE for streaming/youtubers. This is a temporary update.

I uploaded this version if you want to play original Rewind Please in any resolution or fullscreen. There are no other changes or updates, so the game main mechanics will remain the same as original until rating period of the Brackeys Game Jam is ended.

You are free to stream or record this game, as it will look much better as original in any screen.
